project.name: C-C197A-SUBV-05-ST02-DT05-DF12-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C197A-SUBV-05-ST02-DT05-DF12-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a number from the input. Create a struct with two fields: size (unsigned short) and buffer (char*). Initialize the struct using the unsigned short value as a size, and malloc the unsigned short value worth of bytes. Later, memset the buffer in the struct using the number passed in as input. Since the input is a long, and we only allocated an unsigned short amount, we will corrupt the heap, leading to seg fault or glib error. Good inputs: 65535 or less. Bad inputs: more than 65535

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
